title: Fukuyama Gekijou: Natsu no Himitsu
alternative_title: Fukuyama Treater: Summer Show,  ふくやま劇場 なつのひみつ
description: Several short animated mini-stories based on the short stories and four-panel manga of Keiko Fukuyama, including My Father the Mouse, The Rabbit Brothers, Summer Secret, The Mysterious Fairy, How Very Strange, and Kuro.
